languages.text: "Тебе есть ради кого сражаться и не становиться зверем".
"You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."
languages.original_text: "Тебе есть ради кого сражаться и не становиться зверем".

traits.locale_text: "You have people to fight for. People who need you as who you are — a warrior, not a beast."
"You have people to fight for. People who need you as who you are — a warrior, not a beast."
"You have people to fight for. People who need you the way you are: a warrior, not a beast."
"You have people to fight for. People who need you the way you are: a warrior, not a beast."
"You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."
"You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."

languages.text: « Vous ne vous battez pas pour rien. Il y a des personnes qui ont besoin de vous tel que vous êtes : un guerrier, pas une bête. »
languages.original_text: "You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne vous battez pas pour rien. Il y a des personnes qui ont besoin de vous tel que vous êtes : un guerrier, pas une bête. »

languages.text: “你要为别人而战，人们需要真正的你。你是战士，不是野兽。”
languages.original_text: "You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."

traits.locale_text: “你要为别人而战，人们需要真正的你。你是战士，不是野兽。”

languages.text: 「お前には守るべき人々がいる。野獣ではなく、戦士としてのお前を必要としている人々が」
languages.original_text: "You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."

traits.locale_text: 「お前には守るべき人々がいる。野獣ではなく、戦士としてのお前を必要としている人々が」

languages.text: "Ihr habt Menschen, für die es sich lohnt zu kämpfen. Menschen, die Euch so brauchen, wie Ihr seid – als Krieger, nicht als Bestie."
languages.original_text: "You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Menschen, für die es sich lohnt zu kämpfen. Menschen, die Euch so brauchen, wie Ihr seid – als Krieger, nicht als Bestie."

languages.text: «Tienes gente por la que luchar. Gente que te necesita tal y como eres: un guerrero, no una bestia».
languages.original_text: "You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."

traits.locale_text: «Tienes gente por la que luchar. Gente que te necesita tal y como eres: un guerrero, no una bestia».

languages.text: "Uğruna savaşacağın insanlar var. Sana hayvan olarak değil, gerçek bir savaşçı olarak ihtiyaç duyan insanlar var."
languages.original_text: "You have people to fight for. People who need you as you are: a warrior, not a beast."

traits.locale_text: "Uğruna savaşacağın insanlar var. Sana bir hayvan değil, gerçek savaşçı hâlinle ihtiyaç duyan insanlar var."
